summary: This module provides a collection of helper utilities for determining and handling the JAX package version. It can extract version information from the Git repository, generate a version string based on the current date, and write the computed version to a file. It also supplies a commandâ€‘class hook for integration with the package build system.
business_intent: Automate and centralise version management for JAX releases, enabling reliable version extraction from source control or timestamps during packaging and distribution.
